name: P.B.B. Overnight Oats
ingredients: 1/2 medium banana mashed,2 tbsp peanut butter, 1/4 cup of non-fat greek yogurt plain, 3/4 cup Almond milk, 1 tbsp honey, 1 cup rolled oats, 1 tsp cinnamon
instructions: 1. Mash half of the banana in large bowl. </br> 2.Add the rest of the wet ingredients. </br> 3.Add in the dry ingredients and mix again. </br> 4.Place you oats in the refridgerator covered for at least two hours or overnight.
